title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in million U.S. dollars, with a total of 6 data points.
Overall Revenue in million U.S. dollars has increased over the Year
Revenue in million U.S. dollars is gradually constant from 2014/15 to 2019/20.
The steepest stays the same occurs in between the Year 2017/18 and 2018/19.
Max Revenue in million U.S. dollars about 7091.1 was recorded at Year 2019/20
Min Revenue in million U.S. dollars about 4900.8 was recorded at Year 2014/15
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Revenue in million U.S. dollars, with a total of 6 data points. The chart has 3 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2017/18 to 2019/20.
Also, the next significant trend is moderately increasing which exists from 2014/15 to 2016/17.
Likewise, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2016/17 to 2017/18.
